summary: App with admin panel feature. Admin Panel link should only be visible to a specific principal ID (Internet Identity). Currently the link is not visible after login and has never worked.
architectural_notes: Admin access is controlled by a specific hardcoded Internet Identity principal ID
known_issues: Admin Panel nav link never appears after login regardless of user

existing_features.title: Add a temporary debug display on the home page (or any visible area when logged in) that shows the authenticated user's current principal ID as a string, so the admin principal can be identified and hardcoded. This display should only be visible when the user is logged in.

Replace the existing isAdmin backend role check used for showing the Admin Panel nav link with a frontend-only hardcoded principal ID check. Define a constant ADMIN_PRINCIPAL_ID in the frontend codebase (e.g., in a config or constants file). In Layout.tsx, show the Admin Panel link only when the authenticated user's principal ID matches this hardcoded constant exactly. Use a placeholder value (e.g., an empty string or clearly marked TODO comment) until the actual principal ID is provided.

new_feature_requests.summary: Show Admin Panel nav link only for a specific hardcoded principal ID (Internet Identity)
